text: Robert Zimmerman (2 December 1881 - 3 December 1980) was a Canadian swimmer. He competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics and the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Canadian male swimmers Category:Canadian male divers Category:Olympic divers of Canada Category:Olympic swimmers of Canada Category:Divers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Divers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:American emigrants to Canada
title: Robert Zimmerman (swimmer)
